prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon with intricate designs and a magical aura.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies elegance and grace, with shining features.
Generate a cute, humanoid Pokemon that has a whimsical nature and gentle demeanor.
Show me a mystical creature resembling a doll, with enchanting powers and delicate details.
Make a charming Pokemon that combines mechanical and natural elements in its design.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban settings, possessing a lively and friendly personality.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique blend of metallic and pastel colors, showcasing its fairy qualities.
